questions.question: Which of the following statement is true about FET common source amplifier compared to BJT amplifier?
An amplifier is designed using fixed bias configuration, what is its input impedance?
What is the reason for connecting a capacitor in parallel with Rs

answers.b: For ac signal it acts a short circuit resulting in grounding source terminal
answers.c: It blocks the noise and for ac signal it acts a short circuit resulting in grounding source terminal

questions.question: The output voltage at fcl = 12 mV. What is the output voltage at the midpoint frequency?
A sinusoidal signal has 1.5v at t=2S, if this signal is given to common source amplifier with Av=5 v what will be its output at t=2S?
